issue.summary: Incorrect orientation for AC215524.3
issue.description: AC215524.3 extends into telomeric repeat and is by default in the wrong orientation (+).
issue.resolution_text: This patch introduces component AC215524.3 to the q telomere of reference chromosome NC_000004.11 and sets its orientation as minus.

issue.summary: GeneID: 374 (AREG), missed join
issue.description: Possible duplication of sequences surrounding a gap. Acc1 and acc2 are components located on either side of the gap and are implicated in the duplication, but do not actually flank the gap.
issue.resolution_text: AC149643.1 has been removed from the Human chromosome 4 TPF as deleted. AC239584.4 has been sequenced, and it spans from AC122131.4 to AC116645.4, filling this gap.

issue.summary: Assignment of CT476828 from PMID: 18477386 to chr. Un for GRCh37
issue.description: CT476828 has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: CT476828.7 is a redundant variant of the sequence found in GRCh37p.10 from component AF146191 through component AC215524 and has been dropped for GRCh38.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC216823.4 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383527.1 created to capture sequence from AC216823.4 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: NOVEL patch GL383527.1 created to capture sequence from AC216823.4 not represented in reference chromosome

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC234439.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383528.1 created to capture sequence from AC234439.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: NOVEL patch GL383528.1 created to capture sequence from AC234439.3 not represented in reference chromosome

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC225889.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383529.1 created to capture sequence from AC225889.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC225889.3 is suspected to be a chimeric clone and will not be included as an ALT_LOCI in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Possible insertion relative to reference component AC118281.4
issue.status_text: The additional sequence found in AC226157.3 (ABC12-47980600L13) is also an unresolved tandem repeat. Since there is Optical Map support for the reference and no problem is reported here, AC226157.3 has not been added to either the reference or as an alt_loci for GRCh38.
issue.description: Fosmid clone AC226157.3 (ABC12-47980600L13) has a 6933 bp insertion relative to reference component AC118281.4 (RP11-1244E8).
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Representation for possible missing sequence from an unresolved duplication in AC105345.3/AC116643.11
issue.description: AC237671.1 (RP13-253C13) may contain sequence missing from an annotated unresolved tandem duplication located in the overlap between AC105345.3/AC116643.11.
issue.resolution_text: The additional sequence found in AC237671.1 (RP13-253C13) is also unresolved tandem repeat. Since there is Optical Map support for the reference and no problem is reported here, AC237671.1 has not been added to either the reference or as an alt_loci.

issue.summary: Chr. 4 Gap
issue.description: Reference assembly gap between AC225782.3 - AC215524.3
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Unlocalized scaffold assigned to chromosome 4 may belong elsewhere
issue.description: GL000193.1 is an unlocalized scaffold assigned to chromosome 4, however new data suggest it may localize elsewhere in the genome, but there is conflicting data about exactly where it may localize.
issue.resolution_text: Efforts to place this component, AC018692.9, will be tracked in linked ticket HG-660.

issue.summary: Chr. 4 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.status_text: WGS contig ABBA01074265.1 has been added to this gap for GRCh38.
issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between components AC205585.1 and AC234693.1. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-703.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr. 4 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between components AC142281.2 and AC195454.1. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-704.
issue.resolution_text: AMYH02009067.1 fills the gap between GRCh37 Chr. 4 components AC142281.2 and AC195454.1 with 303bp unique.

issue.summary: Chr. 4 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.status_text: The following WGS contigs have been added to this gap for GRCh38: ABBA01008705.1, ABBA01016344.1
issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap between components AC209005.2 and AC116612.5. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-701.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr. 4 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.status_text: The following WGS contigs have been added to this gap for GRCh38: ABBA01032786.1, ABBA01074259.1, ABBA01074260.1
issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between components AC232299.2 and AC142234.2. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-702.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr. 4 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.status_text: The gap flanking components each terminate in unresolved tandem repeat. We are unable to sequence through this repeat with current technologies and have exhausted all other options. Efforts to close this gap are now stalled.
issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap between components AC108519.4 and AC116655.7.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 650293 (LOC650293), assembly gap
issue.description: RefSeq NM_001040071.1 (LOC650293), currently missing from the reference genome, may be located in the gap between reference components AC144557.2 and AC116655.7
issue.resolution_text: A contig composed of AC116612 - AC073648 - AC108519 has been placed in the gap between AC144557.2 and AC116655.7. Transcript NM_001040071.1 has a perfect alignment to AC073648.

issue.summary: Chr. 4 CHORI-17 Pathway
issue.description: Several clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC020698.4 - AF250324.1 region of Chr. 4. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: AC243969.3 contains an additional 9kb of tandem repeat relative to the reference and has been added as an ALT_LOCI. The sequence of AC243969.3 has been updated to AC243969.4 for GRCh39, and this change has been reported in HG-2364.

issue.summary: ALT_REF_LOCI_8 (UGT2B17) reference anchor switch point
issue.description: Incorrect switch point in ALT_REF_LOCI_8 (UGT2B17) between the reference anchor and the first haplotype-specific clone result in the anchor sequence being used over the correct haplotype sequence in the alt loci.
issue.resolution_text: Switch point curated so that the haplotype-specific sequence is represented in the alt loci over the reference anchor.

issue.summary: AL136537.4 is a Phase 2 Clone in the Reference
issue.description: Sequence from phase 2 reference clone AL136537.4 should be replaced with finished sequence.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Assembly component AC097493.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Assembly component AC097493.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AC097493.3 will be used through its overlap with AC116655.7 to capture this 1kG ph1 decoy sequence in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Former 1q21 pericentromeric sequence AL583842.40 needs to be localized
issue.status_text: AL583842 has been placed on the Chr. 4 Unl. TPF.
issue.description: Former 1q21 pericentromeric sequence AL583842 needs to be localized
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 8615 (USO1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Some sequence of the transcript NM_003715.1 does not align to the reference assembly, suggesting a deletion in the assembly.
issue.resolution_text: AEKP01043041.1 has been used to patch the deletion in NC_000004.11 component AC104828.4, which provides representation for NM_003715.2 GeneID: 8615 (USO1).

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC238651.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC238651.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from AC238651.3 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.summary: GeneID: 152687 (ZNF595), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Transcript NM_182524.1 aligns poorly to the reference component Z95704.1.
issue.resolution_text: AC253576.2 has been sequenced and replaces a portion of Z95704.1 and all of AC118278.4, improving the alignment of transcript NM_182524.1.

issue.summary: UGT2B17- representing two alleles in the reference assembly
issue.description: Haplotype expansion surrounding the gap between AC074378.4 and AC093720.2
issue.resolution_text:
Both the insertion and deletion pathways are complete, which should close a type 3 gap and remove a red ball join. Insertion Allele: AC074378 AC079749 AC134921 AC147055 AC093720 AC021146
Deletion Allele: AC074378 AC140484 AC019173 AC226496 AC021146

issue.summary: GRCh38 representation of 4qtel (DUX4) haplotypes is incorrect and incomplete
issue.status_text: CH17-143F3 and CH17-427P10 have been requested for sequencing.
issue.description: GRCh38 representation of 4qtel mixes the 4qB and 4qA haplotypes with an intervening gap. The distal-most component, AC215524.3 (ABC7-42391500H16) is 4qA and contains DUX4, but lacks any of the more proximal D4Z4 repeats. More proximal components on the chromosome (AC126281.3 (XXcos-2173C8) and AC2225782.3 (WI2-3035O22)) represent the 4qB haplotype. The GRC is investigating additional sequences to provide complete representation for 4qA on the chromosome and considering moving the 4qB haplotype to an alternate locus scaffold.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC105289.4
issue.description: Analysis of GU268401.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 4, suggest there may be ~5,121 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC105289.4. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: AC210970.2 has been added to the reference as a novel patch and represents a 3.46kb insertion allele relative to Chr4 component AC105289.4.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC093848.2
issue.description: Analysis of GU269127.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 4, suggest there may be ~2,645 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC093848.2. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC105384.3
issue.status_text: This discrepancy looks like variation and will be considered for ALT representation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267550.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 4, suggest there may be ~1,441 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC105384.3. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC096721.2
issue.description: Analysis of GU268722.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 4, suggest there may be ~4,268 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC096721.2. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: AC207300.3 has been added to the reference as a novel patch and represents a 4.27kb insertion allele relative to Chromosome 4 primary reference component AC096721.2.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC063956.7
issue.description: Analysis of GU267700.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 4, suggest there may be ~4,456 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC063956.7. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: AC221038.3 has been added to the reference as a novel patch and represents a 4.45kb insertion allele relative to Chromosome 4 component AC063956.7.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC079298.8
issue.description: Analysis of GU268112.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 4, suggest there may be ~7,699 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC079298.8. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: This discrepancy looks like variation and will be considered for ALT representation.

issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between components AC119752.3 and AC119751.3.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC243969.4 has had an accession.version update
issue.description: Assembly component AC243969.4 has had an accession.version update. GRC curator review needed to ensure proper representation in future assembly versions.
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of Chr 4 ALT_LOCI component AC243969.3 has been updated based on BioNano and sequencing data. AC243969.4 contains a 3.3kb insertion of tandem repeat relative to the primary chromosome rather than the 9.7kb insertion of tandem repeat contained in the previous version. The introduction of the initial ALT_LOCI containing the previous version AC243969.3 was tracked in HG-1335.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC243969.4 has had an accession.version update
issue.description: Assembly component AC243969.4 has had an accession.version update. GRC curator review needed to ensure proper representation in future assembly versions.
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate of issue HG-2364. Please see Jira issue HG-2364 for all future updates regarding this issue.

issue.summary: GeneID: 100508631 (LOC100508631), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: RP11 may be heterozygous for this indel.
issue.description: NC_000004.12 component AL136537.4 has a 12nt deletion relative to available human transcripts and orthologous regions in several other organisms.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 255403 (ZNF718), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: A piece of the transcript NM_001039127.3 does not align to the reference genome, suggesting missing sequence in between two adjacent clones.
issue.resolution_text: AC253576.2 has been sequenced and replaces a portion of Z95704.1 and all of AC118278.4, correcting the deletion found in these components, and improving the representation of transcript NM_001039127.3.

issue.summary: GeneID: 389833 (LOC389833), many placements, none good
issue.description: LOC389833 (GeneID: 389833) aligns to multiple sites with reduced % ID, suggesting this gene may not be represented in the current assembly (Build 36).
issue.resolution_text: NM_001033515.1 LOC389833 (GeneID: 389833) aligns to AC145212.1 at 99.6% identity. The scaffold consisting of AC145212.1 has been moved from the Chr 4 Unlocalized TPF onto the Chr14 Unlocalized TPF as a result of admixture mapping. Efforts to place this scaffold will be tracked in HG-1285.

issue.summary: GeneID: 402183 (RAC1P5), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Possible genomic rearrangement at the pseudogene location
issue.resolution_text: The reference sequence at the break point of the possible inversion is supported by fosmids AC206894.2, AC238693.2, AC238513.3, AC239780.1, and by genomic fragment sequence AF542527.1.

issue.summary: GeneID: 57733 (GBA3), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_020973.3 (GBA3) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: According to 1000 Genomes data, the frequency for the current reference allele is 5% in the YRI population and 14% in the CEU population. Since the reference is the major allele in at least one population, this issue will be resolved with no change.

issue.summary: GeneID: 7424 (VEGFC), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_005429.2 (VEGFC) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF573691.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 4 Reference for GRCh38 to update this 3nt indel to the more common deletion allele and provide better representation for GeneID: 7424 (VEGFC).

issue.summary: GeneID: 55008 (HERC6), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_017912.3 (HERC6) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product FJ695209 has been submitted as a patch for this error.

issue.summary: GeneID: 768239 (PSAPL1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_001085382.1 (PSAPL1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product FJ695208 has been submitted as a patch to correct this error.

issue.summary: Chr.4 Gap Problem Region #1
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC142416.3 and AC142234.2.
issue.resolution_text: Gap size has been updated.

issue.summary: Chr.4 Gap Problem Region #2
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC142281.2 and AC118275.4.
issue.resolution_text: Gap size has been updated.

issue.summary: Chr.4 Gap Problem Region #3
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC134919.3 and AC009570.13.
issue.resolution_text: This gap has been removed.

issue.summary: Chr.4 Gap Problem Region #4
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC145623.2 and AC142279.3.
issue.resolution_text: Gap size has been updated; gap closed, see HG-707.

issue.summary: GeneID:3166 (HMX1) is only represented on an unplaced contig having no alignment to the reference
issue.description: GeneID:3166 (HMX1) is only represented on NT_113886, an unplaced co with no alignment to the reference
issue.resolution_text: A contig composed of AC116612 - AC073648 - AC108519 has been placed in the gap between AC144557.2 and AC116655.7. RefSeq NM_018942.2 (GeneID:3166 (HMX1)) is represented on AC116612 (NT_113886).

issue.summary: Unplaced contig NT_113887 appears redundant to reference chromosome
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113887 appears redundant to reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: NT_113887 (AC118279.3) has been verified to be redundant and will not be used in the assembly.

issue.summary: Should unplaced contig NT_113888 be retained in the assembly?
issue.description: Determine evidence for retaining NT_113888 as an unplaced contig
issue.resolution_text: NT_113888 will be retained in future assemblies because it is the best representation for LOC389833 (NM_001033515.1, GeneID: 389833). Further efforts to localize this sequence will be tracked in linked ticket HG-1285.

issue.summary: Extra bases remaining after excision of IS2 sequence
issue.description: Extra bases from IS2 excision
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig AEKP01108208.1 has been added to the Chr. 4 Reference to patch the contamination remaining in component AP002026.2.

issue.status_text: The following WGS contigs have been added to this gap for GRCh38: ABBA01019367.1, ABBA01019368.1, AUXG01000026.1, AEKP01171767.1, AUXG01000027.1
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC145653.2 and AC147067.4
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC147876.1 and AC143342.3
issue.resolution_text: BAC AC226119 has been sequenced and spans this gap.

issue.summary: Chr. 4 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC209005.2 and AC116655.7
issue.resolution_text: AC209005.2 extends into this gap, and an unplaced Build36 contig was placed in this gap for GRCh37. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-1298.

issue.summary: Chr. 4 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC142416.3 and AC142234.2
issue.resolution_text: AC232299.2 was sequenced and extends into this gap for GRCh37. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-1299.

issue.summary: Chr. 4 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC142276.3 and AC116630.4
issue.resolution_text: AC205585.1 and AC234693.1 have been sequenced and extend into this gap for GRCh37. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-1296.

issue.summary: Chr. 4 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC142281.2 and AC118275.4
issue.resolution_text: AC195454.1 extends into this gap for GRCh37. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-1297.

issue.summary: Chr. 4 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.status_text: The following WGS contigs have been added to this gap for GRCh38: AUXG01000031.1, ABBA01003476.1, AUXG01000030.1, ABBA01022809.1

issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr. 4 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between Build 36 accessions AC142282.3 and AC149643.1
issue.resolution_text: This patch replaces deleted clone AC149643.1 with AC239584.4 which also closes the gap located between components ABBA01022996.1 and AC149643.1 in GRCh37 chromosome NC_000004.11

issue.summary: Chr. 4 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC145623.2 and AC142279.3
issue.resolution_text: Fosmid AC231991 was sequenced and spans this gap.

issue.summary: GRCh37 TPF update disrupts assembly alignment to Hs Build36
issue.description: Unreported update to the Chr. 4 TPF update disrupts GRCh37 alignment to Hs Build36 in this region
issue.resolution_text: An update to component AF213884 from version .1 to version .2 made two other reference components, AC021120.6 and AF224669.1, redundant, so they were removed from the TPF for GRCh37, causing the disruption of the alignment of Hs Build36 to GRCh37.

issue.summary: GeneID: 729884 (TMPRSS11E2), missing in assembly
issue.description: One copy of TMPRSS11E may be missing from Build 37.
issue.resolution_text: TMPRSS11E2 is contained on BACs that have been moved to GL000257.1 /NT_167250.1 in order to represent a single haplotype in the primary assembly through this region.

issue.summary: ADH1C gene on reference genome does not represent common allele
issue.description: The ADH1C allele present in the ref genome is rare.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459631.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 4 Reference for GRCh38 to update this base to the more common allele and provide better representation for ADH1C.

issue.summary: Possible HuRef WGS to fill Chr.4 gap between AC142276.3 and AC116630.4
issue.description: Sequence from HuRef WGS contig 'NW_001838901.1may significantly reduce the gap in Reference chromosome 4 between AC142276.3 and AC116630.4
issue.resolution_text: AC205585 extends from the left side of the gap and AC234693 and ABBA01074265 extend from the right side and have been added to the Build.

issue.summary: multiple unsupported discrepancies between transcript and genome in 3' UTR of CLNK gene
issue.description: The 3' end of mRNAs in the 3' UTR of the CLNK gene display discrepancies (various substitutions and indels) with the genome.
issue.resolution_text: The discrepancies reported in this ticket have been confirmed to be variation, and the allele currently represented in GRCh37 is not rare, so no change will be made here.

issue.summary: GeneID: 7365 (UGT2B10), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: GRCh37 has a "C" at NC_000004.11:69687987 (rs2942857), which may affect the splicing of UGT2B10 (RefSeq NM_001075.4).
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459626.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 4 Reference for GRCh38, updating this base to the more common allele and providing better representation for GeneID: 7365 (UGT2B10).

issue.summary: HuRef alignment suggests chr.4 gap between AC134919.3 and AC009570.13 may be closed
issue.description: Alignment of HuRef WGS contig NW_001838914.1 to reference chr.4 suggests the gap between AC134919.3 and AC009570.13 may be closed without additional sequence
issue.resolution_text: This gap has been removed.
